summary: This is a prison transfer order dated August 8, 2019, directing the transfer of an inmate (Jeffrey Epstein) from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility, scheduled for August 9, 2019, with instructions to include 7 days of medication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate listed for transfer from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility.

events.title: Scheduled Prison Transfer of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Planned transfer of Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility, with instructions to include 7 days of medication.

keyFacts: A prison transfer order was issued on August 8, 2019, to move Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility.
The transfer was scheduled for August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein was found dead in his cell.
The order specifically instructed that 7 days of medication be included with the medical summary for the transfer.
